title: Great Sand Dunes National Park & Preserve: Plan Your Visit
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit           Plan Your Visit                   Experience the Dunes               Camping and Lodging               Splash in Medano Creek               Experience the Night               Explore Great Sand Dunes National Preserve                2016 Visitor Guide The 2016 Visitor Guide (pdf, 2 MB) provides the best planning maps and overview of the park and preserve.                                      Orientation Video A 90 second video orienting you to locations in the main use area of Great Sand Dunes National Park and Preserve. Produced by Gak Stonn.
